channel.title: 508 Client Teh Codex ERROR (Fixing it)
channel.description:
[b]Ok well, If anyone says this is leached and has proof of it im sorry and I'll delete this or it can get locked. But please don't say: LEACHED! until you have some proof thanks :)[/b]
This is for fixing Error: signlink:233 Signlink:372 Applet_Sub1:338 Client:2194 | Java.lang.runtime-Exception
Ok lets start:
Step one: Go to Start > My Computer [IMG]http://i34.tinypic.com/f53cev.gif[/img]
Step two: Click on Local Disk (C:) [IMG]http://i33.tinypic.com/156frtg.png[/img]
Step three: Make a new folder in your (C:) Name it cache508 [IMG]http://i33.tinypic.com/qy6cz8.png[/img]
Step four: Go to http://rapidshare.com/files/139573589/rs2_folder.zip.html and download the file and extract all the files in there in the folder we made in (C:) cache 508 [IMG]http://i38.tinypic.com/f1h6gw.png[/img]
Thats all hope this helped tell me if you need anymore help :).
Thanks, Busta

item.title: 508 Client Teh Codex ERROR (Fixing it)
item.dc:creator: @underdogz underdogz
item.description:
@underdogz wrote:

Ok well, If anyone says this is leached and has proof of it im sorry and I’ll delete this or it can get locked. But please don’t say:
LEACHED! until you have some proof thanks

This is for fixing Error: signlink:233 Signlink:372 Applet_Sub1:338 Client:2194 | Java.lang.runtime-Exception

Ok lets start:

Step one: Go to Start > My Computer

f53cev.gif400×527

Step two: Click on Local Disk (C:)

Step three: Make a new folder in your (C:) Name it cache508

Step four: Go to http://rapidshare.com/files/139573589/rs2_folder.zip.html and download the file and extract all the files in there in the folder we made in (C:) cache 508

f1h6gw.png798×592

Thats all hope this helped tell me if you need anymore help :).

Thanks, Busta
